select.if: select 'RMR-L'||to_char(#{expDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')||lpad(NVL(max(substr(LOT_CD, 14, 3)), 0) + 1, 3, '0') from RSC_LOT where 'RMR' = substr(RSC_CD, 0, 3) and substr(LOT_CD, 6, 8) = to_char(#{expDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')

select 'SMR-L'||to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')||lpad(NVL(max(substr(LOT_CD, 14, 3)), 0) + 1, 3, '0') from RSC_LOT where 'SMR' = substr(RSC_CD, 0, 3) and substr(LOT_CD, 6, 8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')

mapper.insert: insert into RSC_LOT (LOT_CD, ORDR_CD, RSC_CD, LOT_CNT, LOT_RMN_CNT) values (#{lotCd}, #{ordrCd}, #{rscCd}, #{inspPassCnt}, #{inspPassCnt})
